row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Ablaufankuendigung_Selekt' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '451' :SET &OHNEINBEARB# = 'N' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &VTR_NR_LISTE# <> "" : SET &ORBLISTE# = '&WORKDIR#/&VTR_NR_LISTE#' echo "verschiebe VTR_NR_LISTE von INPUT nach WORK" mv -v "&INDIR#/&VTR_NR_LISTE#" "&ORBLISTE#" :ELSE : SET &ORBLISTE# = '' :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VON = &VALUTA_VON# BIS = &VALUTA_BIS# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# ORBLISTE = &ORBLISTE# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# BESCHREIBUNG = &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# OHNEINBEARB = &OHNEINBEARB# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
